EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Initial Iron Smelting Area at (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of two stone furnaces used for initial iron plate production:
- First furnace at (0.0, 0.0)
- Second furnace at (2.0, 0.0)

### Automated Iron Mining & Smelting System at (-18.0, -49.0) and (-15.0, -50.0)
Two complete mining setups:

First Setup:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -49.0)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -47.5)
- Wooden chest at (-15.5, -47.5) containing iron ore and plates

Second Setup:
- Burner mining drill at (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -48.5)
- Wooden chest at (-12.5, -48.5) containing iron ore and plates

### Copper Mining and Processing System
Mining Setup:
- Two burner mining drills at (-28.0, -61.0) and (-28.0, -63.0)
- Mining inserters at (-26.5, -59.5) and (-26.5, -61.5)

Smelting Setup:
- Two stone furnaces at (-27.0, -56.0) and (-27.0, -53.0)
- Input inserters at (-28.5, -55.5) and (-28.5, -52.5)
- Output inserters at (-25.5, -55.5) and (-25.5, -52.5)
- Output chests at (-24.5, -55.5) and (-24.5, -52.5)

Transport System:
- Belt network connecting mining to smelting area with multiple belt groups
- Main vertical belt line for ore transport
- Secondary belt connections to furnace inputs

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Verify target position is clear before placing entities
- Check for existing entities that might block placement
- When placing inserters next to entities, ensure correct spacing and direction parameters

### Transport Belt Issues
- Ensure belt positions are properly cleared before attempting pickup
- Verify belt connections are properly aligned with input/output positions
- Monitor belt blockages and ensure proper item flow

### Production Chain Blockages
- Clear blocked transport belts to allow continued mining
- Monitor "waiting for space in destination" warnings
- Ensure proper spacing between connected components

### Resource Management
- Monitor fuel levels in all burner entities
- Check inventory capacity before attempting to insert fuel
- Ensure sufficient coal distribution across all machines

### Entity Positioning and Orientation
- Place inserters at exact drop positions of mining drills
- Consider entity dimensions when planning layouts
- Verify entity orientations match intended material flow direction

### System Design
- Clear existing structures completely before rebuilding
- Ensure proper spacing between interconnected components
- Verify all production chain connections before starting operation
